title: LSRL Form
question_text: Least squares regression lines have the form of

choices.text: y = a x 2 + b x + c y = a x 2 + b x + c Define x x and y y as variables.   Define a a , b b , and c c as constants.
y = a + b x y = a + b x Define x x and y y as variables.   Define a a and b b as constants.
y = a b x y = a b x Define x x and y y as variables.   Define a a and b b as constants.
y = a x y = a x Define x x and y y as variables.   Define a a as a constant.
y = a + b ⋅ log ( x ) y = a + b ⋅ log ⁡ ( x ) Define x x and y y as variables.   Define a a and b b as constants.
